name: Emergency Switch
description: When below 50% Health, chance to consume Relic on use is reduced by 35%. Final Relic Charge is not consumed on use, but effect cannot be triggered again for 60s.
unlock: Found on a corpse

name: Samoflange
description: Direct damage taken from enemies, and any additional damage within 2s, is reduced by 50%. Once the defensive buff expires, all incoming damage to wearer is increased by 15% for 10s.
unlock: After collecting two Stellar-Powered Cells you will be able to open a new path an elevator that takes you to a secret room. Just when the elevator arrives, to the side you will find this Amulet.

name: Hallowed Egg
description: Spending at least 30% of a Firearm's magazine to deal damage increases Melee damage by 10% for 7s. Stacks 5x.
unlock: Defeat Root Nexus

name: Talisman of the Sun
description: Increases FIRE damage by 20% and BURNING damage by 50%.
unlock: Inside a chest by a statue

name: Stalkers Brand
description: Gain 10% Ranged and 15% Melee damage. Bonus doubles versus enemies not targeting wearer.

name: Inert Overcharger
description: Standing still increases Fire Rate by 20%, Reload Speed by 15%, and reduces Reeoil by 50%. Lasts 1.5s after moving.

name: Difference Engine
description: While a Shield is active, gain 20% damage and 1.5% of base damage dealt as Lifesteal.
unlock: From the coffins in the ground using the big facility you need to power first the Dark Conduit area.

name: Scavenger's Bauble
description: Increases Scrap pickups by 50%. Automatically pick up any nearby crafting materials.

name: Matriarch's Insignia
description: Increases Melee Damage by 35% and causes all sucesful Melee Attacks to restore 10 Stamina.
unlock: You need to open a door with a key you will find behind a waterfall

name: Gunslinger's Charm
description: Increases Fire Rate by 15% and Reload Speed by 20%.
unlock: Exahust dialoge with Mudtooth after finishing the second world

name: Weightless Weight
description: Increases Movement Speed by 0.75% and reduces Stamina Cost of all actions by 0.75% for every 5 points of Armor Encumbrance.

name: Indignant Fetish
description: Taking damage from enemies increases all damage dealt by 25% and reduces all incoming damage by 10%. Lasts 20s.

name: Spirit Wisp Amulet
description: Activating a Mod reduces current Skill Cooldowns by 3% for every 300 Mod Power spent.
unlock: Get the whisp and progress through the dungeon till the beginning.

name: Golden Ribbon
description: Increases Mod damage by 25%. Activating a Mod grants HASTE for 15s.
unlock: Use the Plain Ribbon on a statue with two figures holding hands, complete the quest in the area to get it.

name: Rusted Navigator's Pendant
description: Grants 15 Health, 15 Stamina and -15 Armor Encumbrance

name: Laemir Censer
description: Increases Mod Duration by 50%. Increases Mod Cost by 15%
unlock: Exahust every dialoge with the Pan you rescue in the boss fight with Defiler.

name: Soul Anchor
description: Summoning increases all damage dealt by 20% for 30s.
unlock: Bloodmoon Altar need 10 Bloodmoon Essence

name: Ankh of Power
description: Grants 15% increase to all damage. Consuming a Relic doubles the bonus for 15s.

name: Dying Ember
description: Gain 5% of base Melee damage dealt as Lifesteal

name: Abrasive Whetstone
description: When attacking a BLEEDING enemy, Crit Chance is increased by 15% and Crit Damage is increased by 30%.

name: Broken Pocket Watch
description: Increases Stamina Regen by 25 and reduces Stamina cost by 50%

name: Butcher's Fetish
description: Increases Critical Chance by 15% and Critical Damage by 25% for 15s after striking enemy with a Charged Melee Attack.
unlock: Buy from Reggie for 1000 Scrap

name: Chains of Amplification
description: Increases all damage dealt to targets suffering from a Status Effect by 20%.

name: Cleansing Stone
description: Reduces Duration of Elemental Status Effects against wearer by 50%. Relic use cleanses Elemental Status effects and grants 15% of wearers Max Health to all allies within 7m when cleansed.

name: Core Booster
description: Increases weakspot damage by 50% for 10s after killing an enemy.

name: Daredevil Charm
description: Gain 7.5% to all damage dealt, 3% Movement Speed, and 5% all damage taker' for each piece of unequipped armor.

name: Death's Embrace
description: Gain 20% to all damage when Health is below 100%. Gain HASTE when below 50% Health.
unlock: Buy from Bedel of the Vaunnt 1000 Scrap

name: Decayed Margin
description: Melee hits gain 1.5% base damage dealt as Lifesteal. For each 25% missing Health, gain 1.5% additional Melee Lifesteal. When Health is full, gain 25% Melee Damage.
unlock: Buy from Cass

name: Detonation Trigger
description: Increases Explosion damage by 25%. Explosions apply 405 BURNING damage over 5s.
unlock: In a giant piston there is a hole, crouch and go underneath to get in the hole before it hits you. Go inside this tunnel to the end of it, you'll find Amulet item near a cliff.

name: Effigy Pendant
description: While Grey Healt is presetn, gain 15% to all damage dealt, 10% damage reduction and 1 addional hit before Grey Health is removed.

name: Effluvium Enhancer
description: Increases ACID damage by 20% and CORROSIVE damage by 50%.
unlock: Buy at the Drzyr Replicator. 15 Iron, 1000 Scrap

name: Energized Neck Coil
description: Increases Status Effect damage by 25%. Applying a damaging Status Effect creates a 5m Explosion for 20% of the Status Effects full damage.

name: Energy Diverter
description: While a SHIELD is active, gain 10 Critical Chance and 15% to all damage dealt.
unlock: Buy at the Drzyr Replicator. 15 Forged Iron, 1000 Scrap

name: Escalation Protocol
description: Increases all damage dealt by 2.5% for 10s after killing an enemy. Stacks 10x. Dealing damage refreshes the timer.

name: Full Moon Circlet
description: Ranged damage Lifesteals 3% of base damage dealt. At full health, damage is increases by 20%.
unlock: Inside a hidden room below a pitfall trap

name: Hyperconductor
description:
Gain double Skill Charges. Increases Skill Cooldowns by 50% and reduces Max Power Generation by 15%.
For Heavy Weapons, doubles Heavy Weapon Ammo instead.

name: Insulation Driver
description: While BULWARK is active, gain 15% to all damage dealt and HASTE.

name: Jester's Bell
description: Increases Mod and Skill Cast Speed by 35%. Casting a Skill or Mod increases all damage by 20% for 15s.

name: Kinetic Shield Exchanger
description: While a SHIELD is active, gain 25% Mod damage and generate 15% additional Mod power.

name: Kuri Kuri Charm
description: For every 10% of Health missing (Max 50%), gain 10% increased Relic Use Speed and 7% chance to not consume a Relic Charge.

name: Navigator's Pendant
description: Grants 20 Health, 20 Stamina, and -10 Armor Encumbrance.
unlock: Chose to live forever while wearing the navigator's Pendant at the world boss

name: Neckbone Necklace
description: Reduces the Damage of Status Effects applied to wearer by 50%. Gain 25% increased Damage when suffering from a Status Effect or Blight.
unlock:
After using the Ravenous Medallion to open the locked door, you will find a lonely creature sitting on a table filled with rotten food. This will bestow the RAVENOUS status effect on your character.
He will ask you to take part on the feast. Eat any meal served, and the event will begin. Fae of many types will spawn in the room and you will have to defeat them.
Once you are done with the Fae waves, the event ends and the host regains consciousness.

name: Necklace of Flowing Life
description: Increases Grey Health conversion by an additional 100%. When Grey Health Conversion triggers, gain 5x the amount as Mod Power.

name: Necklace of Supremacy
description: After 7s of not being damaged, increases all damage dealt by 15%. Incrfases to 25% if Health is full.

name: Nightweaver's Grudge
description: Gain 20% Critical Chance and HASTE when within 15m of an entity suffering from a Status Effect.

name: Nimue's Ribbon
description: Increase Relic Healing Effectiveness by 50% Activating a Relic grants HASTE for 25s.
unlock: Crafted at Nimue with Faelin's Sigil and Faerin's Sigil

name: One True King Sigil
description: Increases Mod damage by 20%. Enhances the effect of Faerin's Sigil and Faelin's Sigil by 50% per Sigil equipped.

name: One-Eyed Joker Idol
description: Neutral Backdash creates a Magic Card lasting 1s. If Card absorbs enemy damage gain 25% Critical Chance for 5s. Neutral Backdash cost 30% additional Stamina.

name: Range Finder
description: After killing an enemy, gain 10% Ranged damage and 2m Firearm Range. Stacks 3x Lasts 10s. ranged Weakspot Hits will refresh duration.
unlock: Crafted at Drzyr Replicator. 15 Galvanized Iron, 1000 Scrap

name: Ravager's Mark
description: Increases all damage dealt to BLEEDING targets by 20%. Bonus increases to 30% for targets with 50% or lower Health.
unlock: Kill The Doe

name: Red Doe Sigil
description: Increases Relic Healing Effectiveness by 30% which doubles when the wearer's Health is below 50%.

name: Shaed Bloom Crystal
description: Gain a 30% damage bonus. Every 5s, the bonus switches between Physical and Elemental damage.

name: Shock Devide
description: Increases SHOCK damage by 20% and OVERLOADED damage by 50%.
unlock: In the basement of the Asylum, enter the first room on the right. Crouch through a small gap. You will find a note and the amulet.

name: Silver Ribbon
description: Increases Skill damage by 25%. Activating a SKILL grants HASTE for 15s.
unlock: Use the Plain Ribbon on a statue with two figures holding hands, defeat Faelin to get the Silver Ribbon (Otherwise will be the Golden Ribbon).

name: Toxic Release Valve
description:
Swapping off an empty Firearm releases a Toxic Cloud, which deals 148.5 ACID Damage to all enemies within 7m. and applies CORROSION. 
Can only happen once every 3s.

name: Twisted Idol
description: Increases Armor Effectiveness by 30% and reduces Encumbrance by 15.
unlock: Buy from Cass

name: Vengance Idol
description: Increases all damage dealt by 30% when the wearer's Health is below 50%.

name: Void Idol
description: Increases Reload Speed by 20%. Reloads only require 50% of magazine from reserves to fully reload.
unlock: Crafted at Drzyr Replicator. Shinning Essence Echo (Dropped by Tal Ratha both forms, 15 Hardened Iron, 1000 Scrap
